thread.title: BRIEF-Insys Therapeutics Initiates Phase 3 Clinical Trial Of Cannabidiol Oral Solution For Treatment Of Infantile Spasms

title: BRIEF-Insys Therapeutics Initiates Phase 3 Clinical Trial Of Cannabidiol Oral Solution For Treatment Of Infantile Spasms

organizations.name: cannabidiol oral solution for treatment of infantile spasms reuters

text: March 2, 2018 / 1:49 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Insys Therapeutics Initiates Phase 3 Clinical Trial Of Cannabidiol Oral Solution For Treatment Of Infantile Spasms Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Insys Therapeutics Inc: * INSYS THERAPEUTICS INITIATES PHASE 3 CLINICAL TRIAL OF CANNABIDIOL (CBD) ORAL SOLUTION FOR TREATMENT OF INFANTILE SPASMS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
